svcsubproc.title: Range Case Service - Cabover Trucks
svcsubproc.para: It is possible to service the range case without removing the entire transmission from the vehicle as follows:

figure.caption: Figure 41. Install Lift Hook to Range Section

step1.para: Remove all range case bolts except one, which should be on top of the case. Also remove the 1/4" air lines. Then install a lift hook to the range section ( Figure 40). The lift hook is part of the rear case sup port special tool.

figure.caption: Figure 42. Pull Range Section From Rest of Unit

step1.para: Remove the final case bolt and pull the range section from the rest of the unit ( Figure 41). A screwdriver or pry bars can be used in the case slots to break the seal.

figure.caption: Figure 43. These Parts Can Be Serviced Without Removing Complete Transmission From Vehicle

step1.para: These parts can be serviced without removing the nine speed completely from the vehicle ( Figure 42).
